message:
Security forces have closed off entrances and exits and roads leading to Tahrir square with Armoured Personnel Carriers (APC's) and barbed wire, in preparation for Friday protests.

A small group of pro-military rule protestors have been holding a sit-in in Tahrir square, since Morsi was deposed on July 3.

The underground metro station closed the stop in Tahrir called "Anwar al-Sadat", as well, in preparation for the protests.
